amendment.description: To require certain air carriers that receive funds appropriated under this Act to accept procedures that ensure the fair and equitable resolution of labor integration issues in transactions for the combination of air carriers.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 499 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 499 proposed by Senator Talent. (consideration: CR S4769-4771; text: CR S4769-4770) To require certain air carriers that receive funds appropriated under this Act to accept procedures that ensure the fair and equitable resolution of labor integration issues in transactions for the combination of air carriers.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 499 proposed by Senator Talent.
